Class SokobanViewSwing

java.lang.Object
com.aoopproject.games.sokoban.view.SokobanViewSwing
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObserver, GameView
public class SokobanViewSwing extends Object implements GameView
A Swing-based graphical view for the Sokoban game. This class implements GameView and is responsible for rendering the Sokoban game board using images for different game entities (player, box, wall, etc.). It also displays the current score (move count) and provides UI elements like Undo and Restart Level buttons.
